sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { GameApiService } from '../../services/game-api.service'; import { SocketService } from '../../services/socket.service'; import { GameRoom, Player } from '@cosmic-games/shared'; @Component({ selector: 'app-game-room', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule], template: `

{{ roomName }}

Room Code: {{ roomCode }}

{{ gamePhase === 'waiting' ? 'Waiting for Players' : gamePhase === 'playing' ? 'Game in Progress' : 'Game Finished' }}

Waiting for all players to be ready...
{{ currentPlayerName }}'s turn
{{ slot.player.name }}
{{ slot.player.isReady ? '‚úì Ready' : '‚è≥ Not Ready' }}
AI Player
üë§
Empty Slot

Deck

Discard

Players

{{ player.name }} üëë
Score: {{ player.score }}
‚óè ‚óè

Chat

{{ message.playerName }}: {{ message.text }}

Settings

Max Players: {{ maxPlayers }}
Game Variant: {{ gameVariant }}
Turn Limit: {{ turnTimeLimit }}s
Point Limit: {{ pointLimit }}
`, styles: [] }) export class GameRoomComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { roomCode = ''; roomName = 'Cosmic Game Room'; gamePhase: 'waiting' | 'playing' | 'finished' = 'waiting'; // Mock data for development players = [ { id: '1', name: 'Alice', score: 0, isConnected: true, isReady: true, isAI: false }, { id: '2', name: 'Bob', score: 0, isConnected: true, isReady: false, isAI: false }, ]; playerSlots = Array(6).fill(null).map((_, i) => ({ index: i, player: i < this.players.length ? this.players[i] : null })); currentPlayerId = '1'; currentPlayerName = 'Alice'; hostId = '1'; isHost = true; isPlayerReady = false; canStartGame = false; // Room settings maxPlayers = 6; gameVariant = 'classic'; turnTimeLimit = 30; pointLimit = 100; // Chat chatMessages: { playerName: string; text: string; timestamp: Date }[] = [ { playerName: 'System', text: 'Welcome to the room!', timestamp: new Date() } ]; chatInput = ''; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit() { this.roomCode = this.route.snapshot.params['code']; console.log('Joined room:', this.roomCode); // TODO: Initialize WebSocket connection and join room this.initializeRoom(); } ngOnDestroy() { // TODO: Cleanup WebSocket connection } private initializeRoom() { // Mock room initialization console.log('Initializing room...'); } toggleReady() { this.isPlayerReady = !this.isPlayerReady; // TODO: Send ready status to server console.log('Player ready status:', this.isPlayerReady); } startGame() { if (!this.canStartGame) return; this.gamePhase = 'playing'; // TODO: Send start game request to server console.log('Starting game...'); } sendChatMessage() { if (!this.chatInput.trim()) return; const message = { playerName: 'You', text: this.chatInput.trim(), timestamp: new Date() }; this.chatMessages.push(message); this.chatInput = ''; // TODO: Send chat message to server console.log('Sending chat message:', message); } leaveRoom() { if (confirm('Are you sure you want to leave the room?')) { // TODO: Send leave room request to server this.router.navigate(['/']); } } }
